abstract: Royal Dutch Shell said on Monday that it would sell its Los Angeles refinery and related assets to Tesoro. Tesoro will pay $1.63 billion, plus the value of oil inventory at closing. Tesoro’s chief executive, Bruce A. Smith, said the purchase would give Tesoro earnings growth even as it faces flatter gasoline margins.
lead_paragraph: Royal Dutch Shell said on Monday that it would sell its Los Angeles refinery and related assets to Tesoro. Tesoro will pay $1.63 billion, plus the value of oil inventory at closing. Tesoro’s chief executive, Bruce A. Smith, said the purchase would give Tesoro earnings growth even as it faces flatter gasoline margins.
